entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -21.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog at times. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:06 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Fog at times in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:06 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
